points.point: Lead a team of five to develop a mental health awareness application to help people track their daily moods and feelings.
Developed a cross-platform app using MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React-Native, NodeJS) and Expo.
Integrated with Tumblr API and TensorflowJS to provide users an individualized experience.
Collaborated in a small team to develop the game of Battle Ship using JS/CSS/HTML.
Implemented new features to an already existing copy of the game developed by another team.
Implemented computer players with multiple difficulties to enable single-player gameplay.
Worked with World Wide Technologies to develop a dispatcher for managing intake, delivery, and stock.
Trained reinforcement learning agent using Q learning. Developed novel methods to reduce the size of the training space.
Improved theoretical efficiency over greedy based approaches by 20\% with respect to employee downtime and total time used.
